TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComboBox/ObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ComboBox.ObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents the collection of items in a .

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装中的项。The class encapsulates the items in the . 组合框的对象集合可用于管理各种类型的对象，包括字符串、 图像和自定义业务对象。The object collection of a combo box can be used to manage many types of objects, including strings, images, and custom business objects. 可以将项添加到集合中有多种。You can add items to the collection in several ways. 方法将一个对象添加到集合。The method adds one object to the collection. 若要添加到集合的对象数，最好是创建的项的数组，并将分配具有方法。To add a number of objects to the collection, it is best to create an array of items and assign with the method. 若要在集合中的特定位置插入一个对象，可以使用方法。To insert an object at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要在集合中删除已知的索引处的项可以使用任一方法或方法。To remove items at a known index in the collection you can use either the method or the method. 方法从集合中移除所有项。The method removes all the items from the collection. 用于添加和移除项，方法和属性除了还提供了方法来查找集合中的项。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items within the collection. 方法使您能够确定是否对象是集合的成员。The method enables you to determine if an object is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道项位于集合内，就可以使用方法可确定项是否位于集合内。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将项添加到组合框。This method adds an item to the combo box. 如果的属性设置为`true`，该项插入到列表按字母顺序。If the property of the is set to `true`, the item is inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，在列表末尾插入项。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 组合框中显示的项的可视表示形式。A visual representation of the item is displayed in the combo box. 此内容的表示形式指定的属性。This content representation is specified by the property. 如果属性是`null`，该项目的`ToString`方法调用以获取在组合框中显示; 否则为由指定的存储对象的属性的字符串显示属性。If the property is `null`, the item's `ToString` method is called to obtain the string that is displayed in the combo box; otherwise, the property of the stored object as specified by the property is displayed. 一个如果没有足够的可用空间来存储新项，则会发生。A occurs if there is insufficient space available to store the new item. 若要添加到组合框，则最好使用一组项方法。To add a set of items to the combo box it is best to use the method. 如果您选择使用方法将多个项添加到组合框，请使用方法挂起在添加过程重新绘制和方法继续重新绘制。If you choose to use the method to add a number of items to the combo box, use the method to suspend repainting during your add and the method to resume repainting. 可以使用方法添加的项列表中指定的位置。You can use the method to specify the location in the list where an item is added. 当一个对象添加到集合中，调用该对象的方法来获取要在列表中显示的字符串。When an object is added to the collection, the calls the object's method to obtain the string to display in the list.

span.span: The parameter was .

summary.span: Adds an array of items to the list of items for a .

span.span: Adds an array of items to the list of items for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性的设置为 true，项插入到列表按字母顺序。If the property of the is set to true, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，在数组中出现的顺序插入项。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order they occur within the array. 此方法通常传递一个数组对象，但任何类型的对象的数组可以传递给此方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 一个对象添加到集合，该方法调用对象的方法来获取要在列表中显示的字符串。When an object is added to the collection, the method calls the object's method to obtain the string to display in the list. 使用此方法时将项添加到集合，不需要调用和方法来优化性能。When using this method to add items to the collection, you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件设置文本属性和使用情况方法填充。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a control by setting the text property and using the method to populate the . 它还演示了如何处理事件。It also demonstrates handling the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体并调用`InitializeComboBox`方法从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeComboBox` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/VB/form1.vb#2)]
